Item 2.02 Results of Operations and Financial
Condition.

On July 18, 2023, The PNC Financial Services
Group, Inc. (the “Corporation”) issued a press
release regarding the Corporation’s earnings
and business results for the second quarter of
2023. A copy of the Corporation’s press
release is included in this Report as Exhibit
99.1 and is furnished herewith.

In connection therewith, the Corporation
provided supplementary financial information
on its website. A copy of the Corporation’s
supplementary financial information is
included in this Report as Exhibit 99.2 and is
furnished herewith.
